item.title: Alpina - what now?
item.description: Overview In the last few weeks, BMW has finally added legendary tuner Alpina to its brand portfolio - after more than 50 years of collaboration at its Buchloe plant in Bavaria.

item.title: Engineering Design portfolio
item.description: Overview This project was completed as part of Warwick’s Engineering Design module. The main task involved the creation of an a abrasive blasting helmet, given a fictional brief.
